import React from 'react' import "../../assets/login.css" import login_pic from "../../assets/partnrd_logo.jpg.png" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom/cjs/react-router-dom.min' import { Redirect } from 'react-router-dom/cjs/react-router-dom.min' import { useSignup } from './useAuth' import registerValidate from './validate' const Signup = () => { const { handleRegisterChange, values, handleSubmit, errors, response, success} = useSignup(registerValidate); const token = localStorage.getItem("token"); if (token) { return ; } return (
